frame.name: Public_services
frame.definition:
<def-root>This frame concerns permanent organizations (the <fen>Institution</fen>s) that are intended to help members of the <fen>Target_group</fen> in a particular <fen>Domain</fen> with a <fen>Service_action</fen>. Most or all relevant members of the <fen>Target_group</fen> have a direct relationship with the <fen>Institution</fen>.
<ex><fex name="ins">The Red Cross Tracing and Message Service</fex> <m>is</m> a <t>service</t> <fex name="ser">for finding and reuniting families separated by war and disaster</fex>.</ex>
<ex>First and foremost, <fex name="Institution">Radio-Canada</fex> <m>is</m> a <fex name="Target_group">public</fex> <t>service</t>. </ex>
<ex>The <fex name="tar">California</fex> <fex name="ser">Child Protective</fex> <t><fex name="ins">Service</fex></t> investigated the family based on a complaint filed by the son's former principal.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Institution
FE.definition: <def-root>A permanent organization with a socially important purpose.</def-root>

FE.name: Domain
FE.definition:
<def-root>The concern of the <fen>Institution</fen>-- broadly speaking, the aspect of society that they affect.
<ex>At one emergency <fex name="dom">financial</fex> <t><fex name="ins">service</fex></t>, I double-checked people's math to make sure they weren't blowing the budget.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Target_group
FE.definition:
<def-root>The members of the public whom the <fen>Institution</fen> is intended to serve.
<ex>PG & E was the electric <t>service</t> <fex name="tar">for much of the West Coast</fex>.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Service_action
FE.definition:
<def-root>The action performed or enabled by the <fen>Institution</fen> for the <fen>Target_group</fen>.
<ex>Reach Out ! is a <t>service</t> <fex name="ser">for helping young Australians through tough times</fex>.</ex></def-root>

lexUnit.name: service.n
lexUnit.definition: COD: a system supplying a public need such as transport, or utilities such as electricity and water.

lexUnit.name: public service.n
lexUnit.definition: FN: a service accessible to the public which is provided or regulated by the state
